sentences.en: And also they followed the bison.
Bison waste no longer fell on the ground to improve the soil.
sentences.cn: 野牛制造的废物也不再渗进泥土改善土壤了.

sentences.en: Bison waste no longer fell on the ground to improve to soil.
sentences.cn: 地上不再有野牛的粪便来改良土壤了.

sentences.en: Bison were killed for their meat.
But the biggest obstacle is the ranchers themselves, whose cattle compete with prairie dogs and bison for grass and space.
sentences.cn: 但最大的阻碍来自牧场主本身，他们的牲畜与土拨鼠和野牛们竞争着草场和空间。

sentences.en: Each bottle contains a single blade of bison grass.
sentences.cn: 每个瓶子都装有一片野牛草.

sentences.en: He later was called a bison.
sentences.cn: 后来,人们叫它美洲野牛.

sentences.en: Herds of bison live in the park.
sentences.cn: 公园内住有成群的野牛。

sentences.en: Large herds of bison used to live on the plains of North America.
sentences.cn: 大群的野牛过去曾生活在北美大草原上.

sentences.en: Nature and fertility would have been all-important; they would have worshipped sun gods, water gods, moon gods and doubtless bison gods.
sentences.cn: 最重要的一点肯定是自然资源的丰饶多产，他们崇拜太阳神、水神、月亮神，无疑还有野牛神。

sentences.en: Now bison herds have increased to the hundreds of thousands.
sentences.cn: 现在,野牛群又增加数以百计千计的数量.

sentences.en: Sixty acres of woods and ponds are home to camels, zebra, bison, water buffalo, ostrich and antelope.
sentences.cn: 六十英亩的森林和池塘是骆驼，斑马，野牛，水牛，鸵鸟和羚羊的家园。

sentences.en: The bison grows to a shoulder - height of 1.5 metres and can weigh 1100 kilograms.
sentences.cn: 野牛可以长到肩高1.5米,重达1100千克.

sentences.en: The steppes gave way to forests, and red deer took the place of horse and bison.
sentences.cn: 大草原被森林取而代之, 赤鹿替代了野马和野牛.

sentences.en: They stuck a bison with spears.
sentences.cn: 他们用长矛刺死了一头野牛.

sentences.en: This is Appa, my flying bison.
sentences.cn: 这是阿帕, 会飞的野牛阿帕.

sentences.en: Watching bison up close is mesmerizing, like watching a grass fire about to leap out of control.
sentences.cn: 近距离观察野牛会使人生疑，就像看到一场失控的大火即将恣肆于草原。
